dict.string: #!/usr/bin/python #coding=utf-8 import urllib2, urllib import json import sys reload(sys) sys.setdefaultencoding('utf-8') sql = sys.stdin.read() params = {'sql': sql, 'reindent': 1, 'keyword_case': 'upper', 'identifier_case': 'lower'} response = urllib2.urlopen('https://sqlformat.org/api/v1/format', data=urllib.urlencode(params)) data = json.loads(response.read()) print data['result']
